website.body: During 7+ years of research with the country’s greatest prospectors, we’ve identified what it takes to score high in all three disciplines and become a Prospecting PhD.

toolbox.heading: The Prospecting PhD Toolbox

MASTER prospecting methods that lead to higher closing ratios and shorter sales cycles
LEARN how to create a Prospecting Assembly Line to have an overflowing pipeline in 4 months
LEVERAGE valuable data analytics to improve metrics you’ve never even thought about improving before
DEVELOP a toughness mindset that propels you forward under any circumstances

whatsIncluded.heading: What's included
items: 365 days of high impact coaching and support
Access to our proprietary toolbox with over 20+ powerful tools
Regular check-ins via phone or video chat for ongoing guidance and accountability
A comprehensive prospecting playbook filled with actionable strategies and techniques

reciprocity.definition: Reciprocation – “requires that one person try to repay what another person has provided”
how: give a great deal of value
provide a free resource that has a high perceived value - set a price

liking.definition: Liking – states that “people prefer to say yes to individuals they like”

socialProof.definition: Social Proof – states that people decide what to believe or how to act in a situation by examining what others are believing or doing there

testimonials.content: I set 17 appointments in one week by Running the ROOTA with three different COI’s.
testimonials.name: JD

testimonials.content: You aren’t just changing how we prospect, you're changing our lives!
testimonials.name: Brian

testimonials.content: This is such a fresh way to prospect!
testimonials.name: Brittany

testimonials.content: When I hire a new sales person on my team one of the first things I do it get them registered for the next Prospecting PhD class. It is our standard training curriculum.
testimonials.name: Tom

testimonials.content: I have created more opportunities this year than any other year of my career and I am only 90 days in.
testimonials.name: Jill

testimonials.content: My prospecting skillset went from a 6-10 today.
testimonials.name: Gary

testimonials.content: Over the last 10 years these concepts have been responsible for millions of dollars of revenue and compensation. There is nothing like it.
testimonials.name: Lauren

testimonials.content: I am on a large sales team and we have regular prospecting competitions and I won this quarter, and I believe I will never lose another one.
testimonials.name: Terri

how: agency owners speaking to their agents success with the program
producers speaking to how the program has lead to their success

authority.definition: Authority – the power or right to give orders, make decisions, and enforce obedience
how: speak to experience training hundreds of producers across the country

scarcity.definition: Scarcity – states that “people assign more value to opportunities that are less available”
how: limited time to enroll - countdown timer

commitmentConsistency.definition: Commitment and Consistency – “a desire in most people to be and look consistent within their words, beliefs, attitudes, and deeds”
how: ask if they would like to grow.
paint a vision of what their life could look like if they were to reach their potential.
ask them if they are willing to do what it takes to achieve this vision.
ask if they are willing to commit to the program and to themselves.
make it easy for them to sign up.
